DOC.brief_summary: The study will evaluate the safety, tolerability, and efficacy of vesatolimod (formerly GS-9620) in adults with chronic hepatitis B (CHB) infection who are currently not being treated.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of the Safety, Tolerability, and Efficacy of Vesatolimod in Combination With Tenofovir Disoproxil Fumarate (TDF) in Adults With Chronic Hepatitis B (CHB) Infection Who Are Currently Not Being Treated
DOC.criteria: Key Adult males or females between the ages of 1865 Chronic HBV infection HBV DNA â‰¥ 2000 IU/mL at screening Key Extensive bridging fibrosis or cirrhosis Received oral antiviral treatment for HBV or prolonged therapy with immunemodulators or biologics within 3 months of screening Coinfection with hepatitis C virus (HCV), HIV or hepatitis D virus (HDV) Chronic liver disease other than HBV Lactating or pregnant females or those that wish to become pregnant during the course of the study Note: Other protocol defined Inclusion/Exclusion criteria may apply.
